# TagDisplay enumeration

Enumeration of ways to display tags on a Onenote Page

```csharp
public enum TagDisplay
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| BelowTitle | `0` | Display tags as comma separated text below the title. |
| InTitle | `1` | Display the tags a single OneNote tag whose name is comma separated tag names. |
